sudan 0.1.0
  • Reference

Sudan population projection 2018 by locality from Sudan Central Bureau of Statistics

Source: R/data.R
population_CBS.Rd

Sudan population projection 2018 by locality from Sudan Central Bureau of Statistics

population_CBS

Format

A data.frame of 3 columns and 189 rows:

state

State name

locality

Locality name

pop

Population

Source

Sudan Central Bureau of Statistics

Examples

population_CBS
#>              state           locality     pop
